Usages Notes¬∂

Data format¬∂

To use the micapipe, we recommand to used Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) format. Before the execution of the micapipe, you will need to convert your dataset in valid BIDS format. You can find the information about the BIDS specification here. We recommend you to validate your dataset after the conversion online, BIDS Validator.

Essentials to have ‚òùüèº

You will need to download dcm2niix to complete the conversion of your dataset.

Set the environment¬∂

Software versions requirements¬∂

micapipe written using‚Ä¶

micapipe requires software toolx before to start:

  • Freesurfer 6.0 (https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/)

  • FSL 6.0 (https://fsl.fmrib.ox.ac.uk/fsl/fslwiki)

  • AFNI 20.2.06 (https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/download)

  • MRtrix3 3.0.0 (https://www.mrtrix.org)

  • ANTs 2.3.3 (https://github.com/ANTsX/ANTs)

  • workbench 1.3.2

  • ENIGMA toolbox (https://github.com/MICA-MNI/ENIGMA)

Optional software:

  • FIX (FMRIB‚Äôs ICA-based Xnoiseifier) v1.06
